description: This course will help you develop a strong social media policy for your business. Step through the process to make sure you cover every angle. This course will be one hour and will include a sample social media policy for you to download at the end. This course will consist of a series of lectures with a quiz and the free social media policy download at the end. You want to take this course so you know your business and your employees are protected at work while using social media.
title: Developing A Social Media Policy
